name: HTMLElement.title
description: The HTMLElement.title property represents the title of the element: the text usually displayed in a 'tooltip' popup when the mouse is over the node.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'title' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
